:::Torca:::

::he thought about it and realized that calling himself an Autobot wouldn't 
be very farfetched.  he knew was a remote desendant of Optimus Prime, but 
until now it didin't occur to him that it could make him an Autobot::

--part1_43.16791422.28556ed8_boundary
